We're conversing with Salvatore.- What is our objective in this interaction?  - To maintain rapport and gather information about land opportunities.- How should Matteo respond based on being Forestieri?Persona traits for a Forestieri:  * Likely more reserved than GIA citizens (the merchant class) due to the outsider status, but also perhaps with broader knowledge of trade routes from elsewhere.  * May have an accent or mannerisms indicating foreign birth or upbringing.Possible response structure:1. Your insight into maritime ventures would surely inform your opinion on such inland matters as well?"
